OOC: By the way, Rodimus is is trying to reach Perseus and other top Maximals on the comm for Kup's briefing.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  After viewing the information briefly he looked up.

"How did you find this?" asked Lord Perseus.  "Perhaps we should discuss this after we've had a chance to use the CR chambers."

He motioned toward the front entrance of the base, Ravenchief and the two troopers stood on the path and waited to receive orders from their leader. 

"Perseus to all teams, mission complete.  Prepare to escort our guest to the CR chambers.  Salveo, please unlock the auxiliary CR room, I think we are going to need some more chambers."

"Understood." said Salveo. 

OOC: This second room is down the hall from the medical room, north-east of the mess hall.


On 7/12/07, Nic < warriorazure@...> wrote:                                   Dinobot: A... small problem. I usually download with the other optic,
 but... Let`s just say I admire your marksmanship. Here we go.
 
 He started sending the information. That included the exact locations
 of the Ark and the Nemesis as well as the presence of the Matrix of
 leadership.
 
 Dinobot: That is the secret I share with you now. I entrust it to you.
 Do not let any minion learn of it. You know what the consequences
 would be. Now... I did mention I had an idea. I do not think opening
 the Matrix would be a good idea since it would be time-limited if we
 find someone who can open it. But, if we divert its energy to create
 some kind of shield...
 
 He stopped, letting Perseus ponder on the possibilities.
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
 >
 > "I don't mean to be impolite, but is there a problem with your optical
 > transmitter?  I am still awaiting your signal" said Lord Perseus,
 glancing
 > over his shoulder a strange look to Ravenchief, who responded by
 shrugging
 > his shoulders.
 > 
 > On 7/6/07, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
 > >
 > > "By all means..." said Perseus, opening an optical data port on
 his chest.
 > >
 > > Ravenchief looked panicked and raised his weapon.  Perseus held his
 > > hand up, telling him to stand down.
 > >
 > > "I'm ready," he said.
 > >

 > > On 7/4/07, Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
 > > > Dinobot: Yes, we are. But before that, to live up to my word, I will
 > > > have to download two series of coordinates to you. Do you mind a
 > > > direct transfer?
 > > >
 > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
 > > > >
 > > > > Perseus stood up and striahtened his posture.
 > > > >
 > > > > "Well, I'm glad we could resolve that.   I trust that you will
 honor
 > > > > your word and tell me what information you have." he said, almost
 > > > > sounding relieved.  "You may use our CR as long as you do not
 behave
 > > > > violently while inside our base.  Are we in agreement?"
 > > > >
 > > > > Ravenchief, seeing combat was over, moved closer to their position
 > > > > with the two troops.
 > > > >
 > > > > On 6/30/07, Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > > > > > The two reply shots came too fast for Dinobot to dodge. The
 first
 > > hit
 > > > > > him right in the chest, while the second whizzed right in his
 > > blaster
 > > > > > optic. He was pushed upwards in the air and landed heavily
 on his
 > > > back.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > Dinobot: That... [grunt] that was... a good... fight. I concede
 > > > victory.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > He hesitantly and slowly got back to a sitting position. His
 optic
 > > was
 > > > > > gone, Blasted away by the shot.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > Dinobot: If you would be so kind as to offer me the
 hospitality of
 > > one
 > > > > > of your CR chambers, I would be more than grateful. But of
 course,
 > > > > > that will have to wait. As I promised, I have to reveal a lot of
 > > > > > things, Perseus.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > Farther, Doc was itchy with his rifle. He had quickly resighted
 > > > > > Dinobot as he went down and did not move the barrel of his
 weapon by
 > > a
 > > > > > millimeter.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > Doc: Rodimus, I really don't like this guy. We should at
 least send
 > > > > > someone down there with Perseus to handle him in case he
 tries to
 > > pull
 > > > > > a trick.
 > > > > >
 > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
 > > > > > >
 > > > > > > OOC: Grats!
 > > > > > >
 > > > > > > BIC:
 > > > > > >
 > > > > > > The first shot missed as he jumped to avoid the first
 > > shot.  Perseus
 > > > > > > fired two shots back.  The second shot struck him in the chest
 > > > and he
 > > > > > > flew backward falling to the ground.  He tried to stand up
 before
 > > > > > > Dinobot retaliated.
 > > > > > >
 > > > > >
 > > > > >
 > > > > >
 > > > >
 > > >
 > > >
 > > >
 > >
 >
